name: Bierschen 2
overview: A basic, German language horizontally scrolling space shooter set after the events of the previous games. You have at least kill 40% of the enemies or destroy the meteors on the levels to finish the level. A pretty easy horizontally shoot em up. A lot of swervy alcoholic aliens, meteors, bonus and even a crazy story: You’re a drunken alien-hunter who had lost your job and needed to do this to redeem yourself. Coded by using special Amal features.
